content:
Rule Class

In this Article

Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("Rule: {Name}")]
[System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Properties")]
public sealed class Rule : Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.RuleSchema, Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.IProjectSchemaNode, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.RuleSchema
  • Rule

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

Typically represented on disk as XAML, only one instance of this class is maintained per XAML file per project engine (solution).

If you manually instantiate this class, call BeginInit before you set the first property of the object and EndInit after you set the last property.

Constructors summary

Rule()

Default constructor. Required for deserialization from a persisted format.

Properties summary

AdditionalInputs

When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of additional inputs to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.
Categories

Gets or sets the list of Category categories that the properties in this Rule belong to.
CommandLine

When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the command-line template to be used by a Build Customization task to invoke the tool.
DataSource

The DataSource for the properties in this Rule. This is overridden by any data source that is defined locally for a property.
Description

Gets or sets a description of this Rule for use by a prospective UI client.
DisplayName

Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this BaseProperty.
EvaluatedCategories

Returns the union of XAML specified Category categories and auto-generated Category categories. The latter are created from any missing categories that are referred to by the properties in this Rule. The auto-generated Category categories only have their names set.
ExecutionDescription

When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the message to be displayed before a Build Customization is executed during the build.
FileExtension

When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the file name extension to associate.
HelpString

Gets or sets Help information for this Rule.
Metadata

Gets or sets arbitrary metadata that may be set on a rule.
Name

The name of this Rule.
Order

Gets or sets a suggestion to a prospective UI client for the relative location of this Rule compared to all other Rules in the system.
Outputs

When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of outputs that are to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.
OverrideMode

Gets or sets the method to use when multiple rules with the same name appear in the project to reconcile the rules into one instance.
PageTemplate

Gets or sets the UI rendering template that is used to display this Rule.
Properties

Gets or sets the list of properties in this Rule.
PropertyPagesHidden

Gets or sets a flag indicating whether property pages for this rule are hidden.
Separator

Gets or sets a token that is used to separate a property switch from its value.
ShowOnlyRuleProperties

Gets or sets a flag that determines whether to hide the command-line category.
SupportsFileBatching

Gets or sets a flag that determines whether multiple files can be batched on one command-line invocation.
SwitchPrefix

Gets or sets the prefix to use for all property switches in this Rule for the case when this property Rule represents a tool.
ToolName

Gets or sets the name of the tool when this rule represents a tool.

Methods summary

BeginInit()

See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit*.
EndInit()

See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit*.
GetPropertiesByCategory()

Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.
GetPropertiesInCategory(String)

Returns the list of properties in a Category.
GetProperty(String)

Gets the property with the specified name.
GetSchemaObjects(Type)

Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type.
GetSchemaObjectTypes()

Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.

Constructors

  • Rule()

    Default constructor. Required for deserialization from a persisted format.

    public Rule ();

Properties

  • AdditionalInputs

    When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of additional inputs to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.

    public string AdditionalInputs { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns a semicolon-separated list of additional inputs.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • Categories

    Gets or sets the list of Category categories that the properties in this Rule belong to.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category> Categories { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • List<Category>

      Returns the list of properties.

    Remarks

    This field is optional. The field returns only the categories that were explicitly defined and that do not contain any auto-generated categories. When a BaseProperty that is contained in this Rule declares its category to be something that is not present in this list, then a Category that has that name is auto-generated and added to the internal list of categories. That auto-generated category is not returned by this field.

  • CommandLine

    When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the command-line template to be used by a Build Customization task to invoke the tool.

    public string CommandLine { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the command-line template.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • DataSource

    The DataSource for the properties in this Rule. This is overridden by any data source that is defined locally for a property.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.DataSource DataSource { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • DataSource

      Returns the data source.

    Remarks

    You do not have to specify this field if all individual properties have data sources defined locally.

  • Description

    Gets or sets a description of this Rule for use by a prospective UI client.

    public string Description { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the description.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

  • DisplayName

    Gets or sets a name that can be used by a prospective UI client to display this BaseProperty.

    public string DisplayName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name.

    Remarks

    This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

    When this property is not set, it is assigned the same value as the Name property (and, therefore, would not be localized).

  • EvaluatedCategories

    Returns the union of XAML specified Category categories and auto-generated Category categories. The latter are created from any missing categories that are referred to by the properties in this Rule. The auto-generated Category categories only have their names set.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Category> EvaluatedCategories { get; }

    Property Value

    • List<Category>

      Returns the union of categories.

  • ExecutionDescription

    When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the message to be displayed before a Build Customization is executed during the build.

    public string ExecutionDescription { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the message.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • FileExtension

    When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field represents the file name extension to associate.

    public string FileExtension { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the file name extension.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • HelpString

    Gets or sets Help information for this Rule.

    public string HelpString { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the Help information.

    Remarks

    Can be used to specify a Help URL. This field is optional and is culture-sensitive.

  • Metadata

    Gets or sets arbitrary metadata that may be set on a rule.

    public System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,object> Metadata { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Dictionary<String,Object>

      Returns stem.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.

  • Name

    The name of this Rule.

    public string Name { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name.

    Remarks

    This field is mandatory and culture-invariant. The value of this field cannot be set to the empty string.

  • Order

    Gets or sets a suggestion to a prospective UI client for the relative location of this Rule compared to all other Rules in the system.

    public int Order { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      Returns the suggestion.

  • Outputs

    When this Rule represents a Build Customization, this field defines the semicolon-separated list of outputs that are to be evaluated for the Build Customization target.

    public string Outputs { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the outputs.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • OverrideMode

    Gets or sets the method to use when multiple rules with the same name appear in the project to reconcile the rules into one instance.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.RuleOverrideMode OverrideMode { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RuleOverrideMode

      Returns RuleOverrideMode.

  • PageTemplate

    Gets or sets the UI rendering template that is used to display this Rule.

    public string PageTemplate { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the UI template.

    Remarks

    The value used to set this field can be anything as long as it is recognized by the intended rendering template.

    This field is required only if this Rule is meant to be displayed as a property page.

  • Properties

    Gets or sets the list of properties in this Rule.

    public System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> Properties { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • List<BaseProperty>

      Returns the list of properties.

    Remarks

    At least one property must be specified. The list returned by this property should not be modified.

  • PropertyPagesHidden

    Gets or sets a flag indicating whether property pages for this rule are hidden.

    public bool PropertyPagesHidden { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns flag value.

  • Separator

    Gets or sets a token that is used to separate a property switch from its value.

    public string Separator { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the token separator.

    Remarks

    The value specified here is overridden by the value specified by the Separator of the child BaseProperty.

    This field is optional and culture-invariant.

  • ShowOnlyRuleProperties

    Gets or sets a flag that determines whether to hide the command-line category.

    public bool ShowOnlyRuleProperties { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns true if command-line categories are hidden; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

    The default value is true.

  • SupportsFileBatching

    Gets or sets a flag that determines whether multiple files can be batched on one command-line invocation.

    public bool SupportsFileBatching { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns true if multiple files can be batched; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This field is optional.

  • SwitchPrefix

    Gets or sets the prefix to use for all property switches in this Rule for the case when this property Rule represents a tool.

    public string SwitchPrefix { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the prefix.

    Remarks

    The value specified can be overridden by the value specified by the SwitchPrefix of a child BaseProperty.

    This field is optional and culture-invariant.

  • ToolName

    Gets or sets the name of the tool when this rule represents a tool.

    public string ToolName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name of the tool.

Methods

  • BeginInit()

    See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit*.

    public void BeginInit ();
  • EndInit()

    See stem.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit*.

    public void EndInit ();
  • GetPropertiesByCategory()

    Returns a dictionary of all properties partitioned into categories.

    public System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary GetPropertiesByCategory ();

    Returns

    • OrderedDictionary

      Returns a dictionary whose keys are the Category names and whose values are the list of properties in that category. The returned value is never null.

    Remarks

    The returned list may contain auto-generated categories. If a BaseProperty (or its derived classes) refer to a property that is not specified, then an new Category is generated for it. If no category is specified for the property, then the property is put in the "General" category.

    The list of categories is exactly as specified in the XAML file. The auto-generated categories come after the specified categories but in no strict order.

  • GetPropertiesInCategory(String)

    Returns the list of properties in a Category.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty> GetPropertiesInCategory (string categoryName);

    Parameters

    • categoryName
      String

      The name of the category whose properties are to be returned.

    Returns

    • IList<BaseProperty>

      Returns the list of properties in a Category. Returns null if this Rule does not contain this category.

  • GetProperty(String)

    Gets the property with the specified name.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty GetProperty (string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property.

    Returns

    • BaseProperty

      Returns the property with the specified name, or null if no property with a matching name is found.

  • GetSchemaObjects(Type)

    Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<object> GetSchemaObjects (Type type);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The type of static data to retrieve.

    Returns

    • IEnumerable<Object>

      Returns an enumerator over all instances of static data that have the given type. Returns Null or Empty list if no objects of the given type are provided by this node.

  • GetSchemaObjectTypes()

    Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.

    public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Type> GetSchemaObjectTypes ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerable<Type>

      Returns an enumerator over all types of static data for the data-driven features that this node contains.

rawMetadata.description: Used to represent the schema information for a Tool, a Custom Build Rule, a PropertyPage, and so on.
